00116                 void LoadBindingListFromXML(BindingList<String^> ^data, String ^tag) {
00117                         KeyValueConfigurationElement ^myElem = settings[tag];
00118                         if (!myElem)
00119                                 myElem = gcnew KeyValueConfigurationElement(tag, "");
00120                         CommaDelimitedStringCollectionConverter ^cv = gcnew CommaDelimitedStringCollectionConverter();
00121                         CommaDelimitedStringCollection ^myColl = (CommaDelimitedStringCollection ^)cv->ConvertFromString(myElem->Value);
00122                         StringEnumerator^ myEnum = myColl->GetEnumerator();
00123                         data->Clear();
00124                         while ( myEnum->MoveNext() )
00125                                 data->Add(myEnum->Current);
00126                 }
00127                 void SaveBindingListToXML(BindingList<String^> ^data, String ^tag) {
00128                         CommaDelimitedStringCollection ^myColl = gcnew CommaDelimitedStringCollection();
00129                         for (int i=0; i<data->Count; i++)
00130                                 myColl->Add(data[i]);
00131                         CommaDelimitedStringCollectionConverter ^cv = gcnew CommaDelimitedStringCollectionConverter();
00132                         String ^myString = cv->ConvertToString(myColl);
00133                         if (settings[tag]) 
00134                                 settings[tag]->Value = myString;
00135                         else
00136                                 settings->Add(tag, myString);
00137                 }
00138         public:
00139 
00140                 AppSettings(void)
00141                 {
00142                         InitializeComponent();
00143                         dataTags = gcnew BindingList<String ^>;
00144                         tags->DataSource = dataTags;
00145                         dataValues = gcnew BindingList<String ^>;
00146                         values->DataSource = dataValues;
00147                         this->textBoxAutoSave->TextChanged += gcnew EventHandler(this, &AppSettings::OnAutoSaveChanged);
00148                         this->checkBoxAutoSave->CheckedChanged += gcnew EventHandler(this, &AppSettings::OnAutoSaveChanged);
00149                 }
00150         protected: 
00151                 virtual void OnShown (EventArgs^ e) override {
00152                         Form::OnShown(e);
00153                         XML = ConfigurationManager::OpenExeConfiguration(ConfigurationUserLevel::None);
00154                         settings = XML->AppSettings->Settings;
00155                         // load documents settings
00156                         if (settings["autosave"])
00157                                 checkBoxAutoSave->Checked.Parse(settings["autosave"]->Value);
00158                         else
00159                                 checkBoxAutoSave->Checked = false;
00160                         if (settings["autosave interval"])
00161                                 textBoxAutoSave->Text = settings["autosave interval"]->Value;
00162                         else
00163                                 textBoxAutoSave->Text = "300";
00164                         if (settings["autosave folder"])
00165                                 linChooseFolder->Text = settings["autosave folder"]->Value;
00166                         else
00167                                 linChooseFolder->Text = "Choose folder...";
00168 
00169                         // load tags settings
00170                         LoadBindingListFromXML(dataTags, "tags");
00171                         if (dataTags->Count)
00172                                 LoadBindingListFromXML(dataValues, dataTags[0]+" values");
00173         }

00418         private: System::Void OnAutoSaveChanged(System::Object^  sender, System::EventArgs^  e) {
00419                  // load documents settings
00420                  settings["autosave"]->Value =  checkBoxAutoSave->Checked.ToString();
00421                  settings["autosave interval"]->Value = textBoxAutoSave->Text;
00422         }
00423 
00424         private: System::Void addTag_Click(System::Object^  sender, System::EventArgs^  e) {
00425                 String ^text=tags->Text;
00426                 dataTags->Add(text);
00427                 SaveBindingListToXML(dataTags, "tags");
00428                 tags->SelectedItem = text;
00429         }
00430         private: System::Void removeTag_Click(System::Object^  sender, System::EventArgs^  e) {
00431                 if (tags->SelectedIndex == -1)
00432                         return;
00433                 settings->Remove(tags->SelectedItem->ToString()+" values");
00434                 dataTags->Remove(tags->SelectedItem->ToString());
00435                 SaveBindingListToXML(dataTags, "tags");
00436         }
00437         private: System::Void addValue_Click(System::Object^  sender, System::EventArgs^  e) {
00438                 String ^text=values->Text;
00439                 dataValues->Add(text);
00440                 SaveBindingListToXML(dataValues, dataTags[tags->SelectedIndex]+" values");
00441                 values->SelectedItem = text;
00442         }
00443         private: System::Void removeValue_Click(System::Object^  sender, System::EventArgs^  e) {
00444                 if (values->SelectedIndex == -1)
00445                         return;
00446                 dataValues->Remove(tags->SelectedItem->ToString());
00447                 SaveBindingListToXML(dataValues, dataTags[tags->SelectedIndex]+" values");
00448         }
00449         private: System::Void buttonApply_Click(System::Object^  sender, System::EventArgs^  e) {
00450                 XML->Save();
00451         }
00452         private: System::Void buttonOk_Click(System::Object^  sender, System::EventArgs^  e) {
00453                 XML->Save();
00454                 Close();
00455         }
00456         private: System::Void tags_SelectedIndexChanged(System::Object^  sender, System::EventArgs^  e) {
00457                 if (tags->SelectedIndex == -1)
00458                         dataValues->Clear();
00459                 else
00460                         LoadBindingListFromXML(dataValues, dataTags[tags->SelectedIndex]+" values");
00461         }
00462         private: System::Void linChooseFolder_LinkClicked(System::Object^  sender, System::Windows::Forms::LinkLabelLinkClickedEventArgs^  e) {
00463                         ::DialogResult result = folderBrowserDialog1->ShowDialog();
00464                         
00465                         // OK button was pressed.
00466                                  if ( result == ::DialogResult::OK )
00467                         {
00468                                 linChooseFolder->Text = folderBrowserDialog1->SelectedPath;
00469                                 settings["autosave folder"]->Value = linChooseFolder->Text;
00470                         }
00471                         // Cancel button was pressed.
00472                         else {
00473                         }
00474         }
00475 };
